basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Slava Makeev. Software Developer inspired by efficient communication and problem solving. I'm a strong believer that communication is the key to solving most of our problems, so I'm doing my best to improve communication between people and servers!

projects.title: Inventory Tracker
projects.description: This was our first group project at Code Fellows. We've built a system that allows a kitchen manager to track their current stock which is uploaded from a database and then restock. It also gives them an opportunity to see the previous order.

projects.title: Cookie Salmon
projects.description: This is my first project - website that serves as a landing page for a store selling salmon shaped cookies. It allowes for some interactivity - at the second page there's a table that calculates sales from all locations and gives the user an opportunity to add another store.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: One of my first projects. It's a voting system that operates with chart.JS library. After the user votes a certain number of times, they'll be given the result, but also a chart showing how often they saw each item during the voting rounds.
